author: Michael C. Bender
title: John Kelly Faces Scrutiny as Trump Questions Response to Abuse Allegations
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump is privately questioning his White House’s response to domestic-abuse allegations against a key lieutenant, placing much of the blame on his chief of staff, John Kelly, according to a person familiar with the matter.

The president was also frustrated with Hope Hicks, the White House communications director who has been in a relationship with staff secretary Rob Porter, who resigned this week following published reports that he abused his two ex-wives. Mr. Trump has rarely made criticisms about...
